medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began abruptly and was sharp after a meal, lasting for 4 days. Patient vomited once at the onset of pain. Pain improved slightly over the weekend, but nausea persisted and pain worsened after each attempt at eating. Pain radiates to the back, worsens with deep breaths, and fever was noted at home.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Mild asthma. 2. Obesity. 3. Migraine headaches. 4. History of right breast lump with negative workup. Past surgical history includes right shoulder surgery for a bone spur and appendectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of alcoholism, brother with deep vein thrombosis/pulmonary embolism, and many cancers on mother's side.
